title: New: Lyves – Shelter
content:
It seems like a long time ago that London’s Lyves (Francesca Bergami) released her debut offering, Visions, despite it being well under a year.

Nine months on, as well as several decent support slots, and shows at Reading / Leeds Festival, she’s unveiled her second track, the sensually charged Shelter. I’m feeling some real FKA Twigs influence in the general vibe of this track, dealing with fears of entrapment, alongside those of lust and love. Another extremely promising step forward.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
